content: lion brand pattern # # infant gratification polka dot baby blanket pattern skill level easy level 2 published in crochet fantasy crochet magazine knit n style knit it knit simple / fam circ ez knit simply creative crochet homespun® baby article #800 *discontinued* 5 colors 1116 yards total a 279 yards b 186 yards c 279 yards d 186 yards e 186 yards *homespun® baby article #800 is the same weight in terms of thickness as regular homespun but skeins are half the size of regular homespun skeins * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm for edging gauge 9 5 stitches + 5 row = 4 10 cm with larger hook over polka dot pattern special stitch mb make bobble bobbles are crocheted in a contrast color to the background color of the strip section being worked recommended catch strand of contrast color in stitches at back of work this will prevent little toes from getting caught in long strands alternating the background color 5 sections of each strip creates a patchwork effect blanket is made in 5 strips comprised of 5 differently colored sections strips are sewn together and edged afterwards also available on joann com pd00174 polka dot baby blanket 1 1 http //www joann com/polka-dot-baby-blanket/pd00174 html
